75ae20c5-bf71-4a14-9da7-3221c0e3c788.name: Magical Style Familiarity: The Onyx Path

3f976527-41d2-4197-ad85-ba88347ba56d.notes: You can buy 1 Style Perk per 10CP in the style's spells in addition to 1 General Magical Perk per 20CP in other spells.

e7cee718-eedf-437b-8ff7-b29fbd614b5b.notes: Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

73295c71-48a0-490a-94df-b7be6567b916.notes: Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

30f407e7-5cf9-44dc-a659-203a60170a7d.notes: Corpse resists Eternal Rest with HT in life. Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

a4d9614e-e662-42b4-9f0b-5e03f810c475.name: Elixir Resistance (Fear)
a4d9614e-e662-42b4-9f0b-5e03f810c475.notes: Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

8ec70921-b86b-4d34-93a0-bf74ae511e71.name: Elixir Resistance (Love)
8ec70921-b86b-4d34-93a0-bf74ae511e71.notes: Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

f80de988-9e54-46f0-8fe5-f900eb2cfa55.notes: Can use Intimidation against witnesses when spell incapacitates or kills someone

63e96314-6026-4af9-a396-e95e66d1a997.name: Huge Subjects (Zombie)
63e96314-6026-4af9-a396-e95e66d1a997.notes: Subtract 1/level from target's SM (minimum 0) before multiplying cost

464e6e5f-a5b6-4de2-a9eb-7e62e233e3a4.name: Improvised Magic (The Onyx Path)
464e6e5f-a5b6-4de2-a9eb-7e62e233e3a4.notes: Switches on Spell Defaults (Thau 38) for the magic style

5ec2edc6-66d9-4473-b61f-e4df86c45230.name: Extra Option, Intimidating Curses
5ec2edc6-66d9-4473-b61f-e4df86c45230.notes: Can use Announcing Curses (Thau 226-227) with baneful Resisted spells

f1a852bd-16d3-484a-89b5-96f8f8347fbd.name: Life-Force Burn
f1a852bd-16d3-484a-89b5-96f8f8347fbd.notes: Ignore -1 per level of penalty when using Burning HP (B 237)

f5cbeafc-a1b3-4a0b-bb0d-f5ef6b6f366f.name: Limited Energy Reserve (The Onyx Path)
f5cbeafc-a1b3-4a0b-bb0d-f5ef6b6f366f.notes: Can use Energy Reserve (Pow 119) for your style's spells

a1ee6c75-9b83-40d6-aefe-c56b5781bd15.name: Standard Operating Procedure, Magical Lawyer
a1ee6c75-9b83-40d6-aefe-c56b5781bd15.notes: Always use airtight wording with spells that require it

2555cde3-e234-46fb-9ddc-989e1f845b55.notes: Can buy spells, perks, etc. of another style

6cf1a4e5-5fd3-4b73-86af-131a8f63b3d1.notes: Can read and speak magical words of seleted language

825117b4-36f4-40c6-affb-862839a86c00.notes: Can use Materials for Wizards (Thau 96-98) for casting spells

cc280202-e7e1-4764-aa1c-ed2cb3aecd32.notes: Allows you to learn a spell that isn't on world's standard spell list

cb5ef603-d77e-451e-b29a-b81dfcb02391.notes: Can acquire Autotrance (B101) as a perk, giving +2 to all spells that deal with spirits, -2 to resist their powers and spells

3d439c5a-447d-4fcf-b5fc-5c015b193a99.notes: Waives spell prerequisites for chosen spell

0a89bc1d-0af9-4415-9f30-3ec568b05e27.notes: Each level lets you buy one advantage on the Lich template

828ef7ed-b4f7-472f-996d-602fa0c6a538.notes: +3 to resistance rolls for selected spell

0b710465-ed38-4547-954b-380a3ec2ed18.notes: Must know all 1st Circle spells and skills

a7bec8ed-1ee4-44fb-90cf-9384da59312d.name: Poltergeist (Onyx Path 2)
a7bec8ed-1ee4-44fb-90cf-9384da59312d.notes: Throws object with ST 15, p. B355.  Cost: 1 pt for an item up to 10 lbs (1d dmg); 2 pts for something up to 25 lbs (1d+1 dmg).

8e3a0dc3-ee47-42c6-95ae-0ea39053e364.name: The Onyx Path - Fourth Circle: Reanimator

4a30d704-f79c-48ba-b473-8a9c1184086d.duration: Turned undead will avoid caster for 1 day

8511965e-f16d-457c-92fb-2435c8b6643a.name: The Onyx Path - Fifth Circle: Summoner

9c87348b-401c-4da9-9803-f8dda5726a47.name: Glimpse of Hell (Onyx Path 5)
9c87348b-401c-4da9-9803-f8dda5726a47.notes: Secret Spell. Fright Check -5 (no helping advantages!) upon non-resistance.

a5da5c92-79fa-45fd-9c5a-24cffd3de42f.name: The Onyx Path - Sixth Circle: Immortal

5b9cd744-4237-4ac5-941a-04a7b286d525.name: Annihilation (Onyx Path 6)
5b9cd744-4237-4ac5-941a-04a7b286d525.notes: Secret spell. Causes 1-4 d6 of damage, ignoring DR. If damage ≥ HT or HP, subject disintegrates completely.

9e6aab38-51cf-42f0-a57d-5f50a99d2bb0.notes: Secret Spell. Drags subject to hell.

2f0b5706-ffab-4f25-ba3d-5993f74faa0f.notes: Thaumatologically refined ectoplasm. Grants casting energy up to spirit's Will.
